tacticulous.game.domain

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.game.domain.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    The Supreme Ruler class; contains and provides access to most elements used by the game.
    Author:
    O

        public boolean endRoundCheck()
        Checks if all units for all players have ended their turns and if so, begins a new round.
        Returns:
        true if all units have ended their turns.

      • checkIfGameOver

        public boolean checkIfGameOver()
        Checks if either player has no units left and if so, toggles gameOver to true.
        Returns:
        true if either player has no units left.

        Returns:
        false if too many units for the map.
